avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow in the area but the remaining snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow in the area. The remaining snow is considered mostly stable after freeze/thaw cycles.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA/A-átt og bjartivðri. Kólnar en hlýnar dálítið á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is generally considered stable. Snow is in gullies and small slabs could be present above around 300 m.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are still possible windslabs in southerly aspects high in starting zones and just below ridges. The snow has subside, gain strength and melted last days in mild weather.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA-átt og skýjað með köflum en léttir til á miðvikudag. Kólnar í veðri en hlýnar dálítið aftur á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is considered stable in general after freeze/thaw cycles.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow at low elevations. Snow remaining in the mountains is considered stable after freeze/thaw. Some new snow forecased during snowshowers but in a very little amount.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA-læg átt og dálítil él. Dregur úr á miðvikudag og léttir til á fimmtudag. Kólnar í veðri.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs could be present, especially on SW-W aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed over the weekend. Under the new snow was older snow at high elevations, especially in gullies and lows. Wind slabs could be present, especially on SW-W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA/N-átt og él. Dregur úr úrkomu á miðvikudag, snýst í vestlægari átt og léttir til. Kólnar í veðri.
